org.apache.catalina.tribes.group.interceptors

类 SimpleCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.tribes.group.ChannelInterceptorBase
      • org.apache.catalina.tribes.group.interceptors.SimpleCoordinator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelInterceptor, Heartbeat, MembershipListener

    public class SimpleCoordinator
extends ChannelInterceptorBase
    A dinky coordinator, just uses a sorted version of the member array.
    作者:
    rnewson

        从接口复制的说明: MembershipListener

      • memberDisappeared

        public void memberDisappeared(Member member)
        从接口复制的说明: MembershipListener
        A member was removed from the group
        If the member left voluntarily, the Member.getCommand will contain the Member.SHUTDOWN_PAYLOAD data
        指定者:
        memberDisappeared 在接口中 MembershipListener
        覆盖:
        memberDisappeared 在类中 ChannelInterceptorBase
        参数:
        member - Member
        另请参阅:
        Member.SHUTDOWN_PAYLOAD

      • start

        public void start(int svc)
           throws ChannelException
        从类复制的说明: ChannelInterceptorBase
        Starts up the channel. This can be called multiple times for individual services to start The svc parameter can be the logical or value of any constants
        指定者:
        start 在接口中 ChannelInterceptor
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 ChannelInterceptorBase
        参数:
        svc - int value of
        DEFAULT - will start all services
        MBR_RX_SEQ - starts the membership receiver
        MBR_TX_SEQ - starts the membership broadcaster
        SND_TX_SEQ - starts the replication transmitter
        SND_RX_SEQ - starts the replication receiver
        抛出:
        ChannelException - if a startup error occurs or the service is already started.
        另请参阅:
        Channel

      • stop

        public void stop(int svc)
          throws ChannelException
        从类复制的说明: ChannelInterceptorBase
        Shuts down the channel. This can be called multiple times for individual services to shutdown The svc parameter can be the logical or value of any constants
        指定者:
        stop 在接口中 ChannelInterceptor
        覆盖:
        stop 在类中 ChannelInterceptorBase
        参数:
        svc - int value of
        DEFAULT - will shutdown all services
        MBR_RX_SEQ - stops the membership receiver
        MBR_TX_SEQ - stops the membership broadcaster
        SND_TX_SEQ - stops the replication transmitter
        SND_RX_SEQ - stops the replication receiver
        抛出:
        ChannelException - if a startup error occurs or the service is already started.
        另请参阅:
        Channel
